title: Palindrome Partitioning
content:
Given a string s, partition s such that every substring of the partition is a palindrome.

Return all possible palindrome partitioning of s.

Example:

Input: "aab"
Output:
[
  ["aa","b"],
  ["a","a","b"]
]
companyTagStats: {"2": [{"taggedByAdmin": false, "name": "Amazon", "slug": "amazon", "timesEncountered": 2}, {"taggedByAdmin": false, "name": "Google", "slug": "google", "timesEncountered": 2}, {"taggedByAdmin": false, "name": "Adobe", "slug": "adobe", "timesEncountered": 2}, {"taggedByAdmin": false, "name": "Yahoo", "slug": "yahoo", "timesEncountered": 2}], "1": [{"taggedByAdmin": false, "name": "Uber", "slug": "uber", "timesEncountered": 2}, {"taggedByAdmin": false, "name": "Qualtrics", "slug": "qualtrics", "timesEncountered": 2}], "3": [{"taggedByAdmin": true, "name": "Bloomberg", "slug": "bloomberg", "timesEncountered": 0}]}
